TopicTitle: (sorry if repost) {REQUEST} --- Red Dwarf Ships for 0.22

Articles.Content:
As above, sorry id this is a repost i forgot to add notifications

Just wondering if anyone out there could make a red dwarf mining ship and or starbug for 0.22

Thanks, Iron

See this post here - SciFi Ship Yards Starbug is on the list and I voted for it but the masses voted for voyager. Making Red Dwarf Suits is on my "To do" list as I am a huge Dwarfer. Note if the Sci Fi suits win the pole on my Green Skull Inc Custom Spacesuits Development Thread expect to see them sooner rather than later and then you could build a replica from a mish mash of parts.
